Skill.Name: Basic Synthesis
Skill.Description: Increases progress.

Skill.Name: Rapid Synthesis
Skill.Description: Increases progress.

Skill.Name: Muscle Memory
Skill.Description: Increases progress.

Skill.Name: Careful Synthesis
Skill.Description: Increases progress.

Skill.Name: Focused Synthesis
Skill.Description: Increases progress.

Skill.Name: Groundwork
Skill.Description: Increases progress at greater to durability. Efficiency decreases by half when durability is below durability.

Skill.Name: Delicate Synthesis
Skill.Description: Increases both progress and quality.

Skill.Name: Observe
Skill.Description: Do nothing for one step.

Skill.Name: Intensive Synthesis
Skill.Description: Increases progress.

Skill.Name: Prudent Synthesis
Skill.Description: Increases progress at half the durability.

Skill.Name: Basic Touch
Skill.Description: Increases quality.

Skill.Name: Standard Touch
Skill.Description: Increases quality.

Skill.Name: Byregot's Blessing
Skill.Description: Increases quality. Inner Quiet effect ends upon use.

Skill.Name: Precise Touch
Skill.Description: Increases quality.

Skill.Name: Prudent Touch
Skill.Description: Increases quality at half the durability.

Skill.Name: Focused Touch
Skill.Description: Increases quality.

Skill.Name: Reflect
Skill.Description: Increases quality.

Skill.Name: Preparatory Touch
Skill.Description: Increases quality at a greater to durability.

Skill.Name: Trained Eye
Skill.Description: Increases quality by 100%. Available only on the first step. Recipe level must be at least 10 levels below yours. Cannot be used with expert crafting recipes.

Skill.Name: Advanced Touch
Skill.Description: Increases quality.

Skill.Name: Trained Finesse
Skill.Description: Increases quality at no to durability.

Skill.Name: Master's Mend
Skill.Description: Restores item durability by 30.

Skill.Name: Waste Not
Skill.Description: Reduces loss of durability by 50% for the next four steps.

Skill.Name: Waste Not II
Skill.Description: Reduces loss of durability by 50% for the next eight steps.

Skill.Name: Manipulation
Skill.Description: Restores 5 points of durability after each step for the next eight steps. Requires completion of job quest to acquire.

Skill.Name: Veneration
Skill.Description: Increases efficiency of Synthesis actions by 50% for the next four steps.

Skill.Name: Great Strides
Skill.Description: Increases the efficiency of next Touch action by 100%. Effect active for three steps.

Skill.Name: Innovation
Skill.Description: Increases efficiency of Touch actions by 50% for the next four steps.

Skill.Name: Final Appraisal
Skill.Description: The next action that would complete item synthesis will instead leave one progress point remaining.

Skill.Name: Hasty Touch
Skill.Description: Increases quality and requies no CP.

Skill.Name: Heart and Soul
Skill.Description: Allows the execution of Precise Touch, Intensive Synthesis, or Tricks of the Trade regardless of material condition. Effect ends if the aforementioned actions are executed when material condition is not "Good" or "Excellent".
